attributes.action: put greater emphasis on establishing fish restocking reserves, like Lundy, perhaps combined with tidal power lagoons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One can imagine a Dutch 'Delta Plan' style dyke enclosing part of the Dogger Bank for the dual purpose of fish restocking reserve and tidal power mill, as in the Rance. I guess the fish would survive the turbines if the blades were big enough and the dyke would keep out the poachers.
